ValidationRule.description: On Reference PAC Objects; Record Type Reference PAC. Create a validation rule that triggers when the field named Status starts with "Closed", the field named CPR Status EQUALS NULL, field named CPR Group New? = "Yes" , and field named Main Responsibility
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), BEGINS(TEXT(Status__c),'Closed'), ISBLANK(TEXT(CPR_Status__c)), ISPICKVAL(CPR_Group_New__c,'Yes'), BEGINS(TEXT(Main_Responsibility__c),'Client'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CPR Status field can't be NULL
